summary: The Licensing Aerospace Units to New Commercial Heights Act (LAUNCH Act) aims to streamline regulations and licensing processes for the commercial space industry. It focuses on evaluating and reforming existing regulations, establishing a digital licensing system, and improving the licensing process for private remote sensing space systems. The bill addresses delays and inefficiencies in current procedures, encouraging innovation and industry engagement. It also mandates reports and briefings, and establishes a Commercial Space Transportation Administration within the Department of Transportation.
